MAN.TITLE: drawnow

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : a handle, the handle on an axes entity

MAN.DESCRIPTION:
This function can be used to draw a graphics entity and all its chidren. It can specially be used with the drawlater function. Without any argument drawnow draws the current axes children visible. With a handle argument on a axes entity it makes the corresponding axes children visible. With "all" makes all the current figure axes children visible. Note that if a children as its visibility property equal to "off" il will not be drawn.
If a is a handle on axes drawnow(h) is equivalent to f.visible="on"
MAN.EXAMPLE:
set("figure_style","new") // select entity based graphics
h=get("current_figure") //gets handle on the current figure drawlater() t=1:10;plot2d(t,t.^2) drawnow()
